name: Flight Finder with Notifications and Booking Verification

message.subject: Flight Found - {{ $json.bestFlight.departure }} to {{ $json.bestFlight.destination }}

parameters.responseBody:
={
  "status": "success",
  "message": "Flight found and notifications sent",
  "flight": {{ $json.bestFlight }},
  "verificationWebhook": "https://your-n8n-instance.com/webhook/flight-verification",
  "instructions": "Check your email and Slack for flight details. Reply to email with CONFIRM or CANCEL to proceed."
}

meta.description: Enhanced flight finder workflow that searches for flights, sends Gmail and Slack notifications when found, requests user verification for booking, and calls a separate booking workflow via webhook upon confirmation.
